title: CS 220 as a CS major?
body: Need some extra random credits and a GPA booster. Figured this would be a good way to do it while simultaneously learning python. Is it an easy A for a Junior in CS? Or is it like learning a completely new subject? I got an A in 200, AB in 300, and B in 400. I also recall spending a lottt of time on 200, so I’m wondering if I’ll still have to spend that kind of time in 220. I don’t want it to take much time away from me studying for OS.
comments: Python is simple you’re chillin. They didn’t let you skip to 320 when I took it and I skipped every lecture and still got a high A
